name: Mirrority
description:
Hi everyone

    This is my game "Mirrority", and this is a simple game. I try a lot during the time of designing and programming this game. I admit what I think is too big to complete all in a short time by myself, and I try my best to do it. 

    This game is a 2D platform adventure game. Its story is mainly about a graduation the Brave Major student's challenge to pass the  city with  harsh environment and changeable enemies.

.

  I use these in my program: UniversalRenderPipeline, Tilemap,  and Cinemachine. I have never the Cinemachine before, and this problem also improves me that how to use them to get a better game effect. 

I designed the appearance and skills of the enemies and the player character. Due to the limitations of my personal abilities, they could not do very complicated movements.

This game does not have very complicated operations, and it is easy to pass the level for players who are not good at playing platform action games.
